description: Try our easy to follow White Bean Stuffed Capsicum & Tomato recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Stuffed capsicum,Low saturated fat,High fibre,High protein,Seafood free,Low salt,Tomato,Low sugar,Low fat
name: White Bean Stuffed Capsicum & Tomato Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 180Â°C. Line a large baking tray with baking paper. Slice tops from capsicums and 4 tomatoes. Reserve tops (lids). Using a teaspoon remove pulp from the 4 tomatoes and remove seeds from capsicums. Place tomato pulp in a small bowl. Finely dice remaining 2 tomatoes and add to tomato pulp.

Heat oil in a frying pan over a medium heat. Add onion and garlic and cook for 3 minutes or until onion is soft. Add reserved chopped tomatoes, lemon rind, 1/3 cup lemon juice and thyme leaves. Stir until well combined and mixture comes to the boil. Reduce heat and simmer until liquid has almost evaporated. Add beans to tomato mixture. Roughly mash beans. Remove pan from heat. Spoon mixture into prepared capsicum and tomatoes. Place 'lids' onto vegetables and place in oven. Spray capsicum and tomatoes with olive oil. Bake for 2025 minutes or until capsicum and tomatoes are tender.
Place a capsicum and a tomato onto 4 serving plates. Remove 'lids' and spoon 2 teaspoons basil pesto on each vegetable. Top with lids and serve with crusty bread.
